Responsible 
Management  
of Operations
We are always striving to be better in everything  
we do   Our commitment to continuous  
improvement extends far beyond the solutions  
and value we offer our customers   We also recognize 
and care deeply about minimizing our operational 
impact on the world around us   
Stericycle’s aim is always to create the greatest value 
while conserving resources and leaving the smallest 
footprint   As we push toward greater excellence, we 
strive to align environmental, financial, and stakeholder 
goals in ways that create environmental benefit and 
harmonize oftentimes competing goals   
11We protect what matters.
